ygData.subject: hate crime petition
ygData.msgSnippet: i had recently sent you all (i think all of you) a petition to broaden the federal law of hate crimes to accept crimes based on sexual orientation, and a
ygData.messageBody:
i had recently sent you all (i think all of you) a petition to broaden
the federal law of hate crimes to accept crimes based on sexual
orientation, and a couple of other things (i think based on sex was
included but not sure) one of you wrote me back saying please not to
send them any chain letters again, well i do not feel that this is a
chain letter (that is if it is not a hoax), i feel that this is a
political petition, but if any of you did not appriciate me sending this
to you then i send you my uptmost apologys, i do not mean to anger or
offend, thank you for your cooperation


Jose A. Muela
